alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 21 at 11:16AM AKST until February 23 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of a light glaze. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. Visibility one quarter mile or less at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief break in the blizzard conditions is expected this evening.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
